[!exec:cat] stop

# Add to stdout
exec cat hello.text
! stderr .
stdout 'hello world'

# Reverse stdout
reverse 'hello world'
! stderr .
stdout 'dlrow olleh'

# Test that we didn't mess anything up
exec cat hello.text
! stderr .
stdout 'hello world'

# Test stderr
! reverse ''
! stdout .
stderr 'reverse can''t be blank'

-- hello.text --
hello world
